languages.text: {n}Даже на таком расстоянии вы чувствуете отчетливый запах озона — слишком свежий для этого душного и пропахшего гарью и смазкой помещения. Женщина поднимает изуродованную руку, на которой не хватает трех пальцев, и рассеянно поправляет свалявшиеся волосы.{/n}

{n}Even at this distance you can detect the distinct smell of ozone — too fresh for this stuffy room reeking of soot and industrial lubricant. The woman raises a maimed hand and absent-mindedly runs its two remaining fingers through her matted hair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Даже на таком расстоянии вы чувствуете отчетливый запах озона — слишком свежий для этого душного и пропахшего гарью и смазкой помещения. Женщина поднимает изуродованную руку, на которой не хватает трех пальцев, и рассеянно поправляет свалявшиеся волосы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Even at this distance you can smell the distinct odor of ozone — too fresh for this stuffy room reeking of soot and industrial lubricant. The woman raises a maimed hand and absent-mindedly runs the two remaining fingers through her matted hair.{/n}

{n}Even at this distance you can detect the distinct smell of ozone — too fresh for this stuffy room reeking of soot and industrial lubricant. The woman raises a maimed hand and absent-mindedly runs its two remaining fingers through her matted hair.{/n}

{n}Even at this distance you can detect the distinct smell of ozone — too fresh for this stuffy room reeking of soot and industrial lubricant. The woman raises a maimed hand and absent-mindedly runs its two remaining fingers through her matted hair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}哪怕是在这个距离，你也闻到了明显的臭氧味。这新鲜的气味，与充满煤烟与工业润滑油的闷热房间格格不入。那个女人举起了一只残缺不全的手，心不在焉地用剩下的两根手指拨弄着她蓬乱的头发。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even at this distance you can detect the distinct smell of ozone — too fresh for this stuffy room reeking of soot and industrial lubricant. The woman raises a maimed hand and absent-mindedly runs its two remaining fingers through her matted hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}哪怕是在这个距离，你也闻到了明显的臭氧味。这新鲜的气味，与充满煤烟与工业润滑油的闷热房间格格不入。那个女人举起了一只残缺不全的手，心不在焉地用剩下的两根手指拨弄着她蓬乱的头发。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Incluso a esta distancia puedes notar el distintivo olor a ozono. Es demasiado fresco para una sala que apesta a hollín y lubricante industrial. La mujer levanta una mano mutilada y recorre con los dos dedos que le quedan su pelo apelmazado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even at this distance you can detect the distinct smell of ozone — too fresh for this stuffy room reeking of soot and industrial lubricant. The woman raises a maimed hand and absent-mindedly runs its two remaining fingers through her matted hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incluso a esta distancia puedes notar el distintivo olor a ozono. Es demasiado fresco para una sala que apesta a hollín y lubricante industrial. La mujer levanta una mano mutilada y recorre con los dos dedos que le quedan su pelo apelmazado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この距離でもオゾン特有の臭いを感じることができる…ススと機械油が充満しているこの空間にしては、自然を感じる香りだ。女は傷を負った手を挙げると、光の消えた瞳で、残った2本の指をモジャモジャの髪に走らせた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even at this distance you can detect the distinct smell of ozone — too fresh for this stuffy room reeking of soot and industrial lubricant. The woman raises a maimed hand and absent-mindedly runs its two remaining fingers through her matted hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この距離でもオゾン特有の臭いを感じることができる…ススと機械油が充満しているこの空間にしては、自然を感じる香りだ。女は傷を負った手を挙げると、光の消えた瞳で、残った2本の指をモジャモジャの髪に走らせた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Selbst auf diese Entfernung nimmst du eindeutig den Geruch von Ozon wahr – zu frisch für diesen stickigen Raum, der nach Ruß und Industrieschmiermittel stinkt. Die Frau hebt eine verstümmelte Hand und streicht sich abwesend mit den zwei verbliebenen Fingern durch ihr verfilztes Haar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even at this distance you can detect the distinct smell of ozone — too fresh for this stuffy room reeking of soot and industrial lubricant. The woman raises a maimed hand and absent-mindedly runs its two remaining fingers through her matted hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Selbst auf diese Entfernung nimmst du eindeutig den Geruch von Ozon wahr – zu frisch für diesen stickigen Raum, der nach Ruß und Industrieschmiermittel stinkt. Die Frau hebt eine verstümmelte Hand und streicht sich abwesend mit den zwei verbliebenen Fingern durch ihr verfilztes Haar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Même à cette distance, vous détectez une légère odeur d'ozone, trop fraîche pour cette pièce qui empeste la suie et le lubrifiant industriel. L'air absent, la femme lève une main mutilée et passe les deux seuls doigts qui lui restent dans sa chevelure emmêlée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even at this distance you can detect the distinct smell of ozone — too fresh for this stuffy room reeking of soot and industrial lubricant. The woman raises a maimed hand and absent-mindedly runs its two remaining fingers through her matted hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Même à cette distance, vous détectez une légère odeur d'ozone, trop fraîche pour cette pièce qui empeste la suie et le lubrifiant industriel. L'air absent, la femme lève une main mutilée et passe les deux seuls doigts qui lui restent dans sa chevelure emmêlée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu mesafeden dahi ozon kokusunu alabiliyorsun. Bu sıkış tepiş odanın havası, buram buram is ve endüstriyel yağ kokarken ozonun ferah kokusu ise zıtlık yaratıyor. Kadın, sakatlanan elini kaldırıp kalan iki parmağını dalgınca saçında gezdiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even at this distance you can detect the distinct smell of ozone — too fresh for this stuffy room reeking of soot and industrial lubricant. The woman raises a maimed hand and absent-mindedly runs its two remaining fingers through her matted hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu mesafeden dahi ozon kokusunu alabiliyorsun. Bu sıkış tepiş odanın atmosferi, buram buram is ve endüstriyel yağlayıcı kokuyor ancak ozonun ferah kokusu bir zıtlık yaratıyor. Kadın sakatlanan elini kaldırıp kalan iki parmağını dalgınca saçında gezdiriyor.{/n}
